fact-2.value: BAE Systems plc is one of the world’s largest aerospace and defence companies, employing a highly-skilled global workforce of approximately 90,000 people located in over 40 countries. The geographic diversity of our business is a major strength and differentiator among our peers in the defence sector. We are the largest defence contractor in both the UK and Australia, and a top ten defence prime contractor in the US. Our business spans all domains of the global security market, from Air and Space, to Land, Sea, Subsurface and Cyber domains.
